jquery-tips

Just another jQuery plugin for tooltips

Usage:

Import the jquery-tips.css and jquery-tips.js files. Then:

$(document).ready(function() {
  // Extracts tooltip text from `title` or `data-tip` attribute
  // Examples below
  $(".tip").tips();
});
